name: Call Darkness
description:
causes all attacks to count as if performed from behind the target and increases your $buff_type_1$ by $buff_amount_1$% with the duration of the power scaling with amount of Pips spent.

1 Pip: 6 seconds 
2 Pips: 8 seconds
3 Pips: 10 seconds 
4 Pips: 12 seconds
5 Pips: 14 seconds
shortDescription: All Attacks Count as From Behind
